constraints_details.result: Hinterland Lower Lea Valley including Stratford

description: Application for full planning permission for mixed use redevelopment comprising: Demolition of existing buildings and structures and erection of a five (5) to six (6) storey building to provide 2367 sqm (GIA) of commercial space (use class B1c) with commercial yard area for servicing, 55 residential dwellings (19 x 1 bed, 19 x 2 bed and 17 x 3 bed), upper level amenity areas, cycle parking and refuse/recycling stores.
